duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement quality initiatives such as 5S and Lean, and track KPI’s in product/manufacturing quality to identify improvement opportunities.
Maintain compliance with quality standards, compile activity reports to measure productivity, and execute improvement plans.
Oversee health and safety procedures, and analyze, set, and maintain minimum stock levels for all products.
Manage the warehouse team, maintain finished good stock levels, and oversee the returns process.
Research and source suppliers, review bill of materials for cost savings, and negotiate with suppliers for competitive pricing and terms.
Develop supplier policies/scorecards, monitor inventory stock levels, and communicate due dates of backorders to the sales and production team.
Coordinate training and development of subordinate staff, evaluate personnel needs, and positively lead and influence employees towards achieving goals.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Operations, Supply Chain Management or related field (Master’s preferred)
